mdRecord.dcterms:title: John Carter Brown Library, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hartman-Cox Architects (American architectural firm, contemporary) [work]
Shepley, Rutan, and Coolidge (American architectural firm, contemporary) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Library is housed in a Beaux-Arts style building, designed originally by Shepley, Rutan, and Coolidge, which opened in 1904. An expansion, the Caspersen Building, was completed in the early 1990s by the Washington D.C. architects, Hartman-Cox. It is located on the main green of Brown University. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Carter_Brown_Library [work]
